Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: pokey adj 1: wasting time [syn: {dilatory}, {laggard}, {poky}] 2: small and remote and insignificant; "a jerkwater college"; "passed a series of poky little one-horse towns" [syn: {jerkwater}, {one-horse}, {poky}] n : a slang term for jail
